messages.subject: fragment correction Re: Hi...testing the waters...
messages.msgSnippet: [I mailed this immediately, yesterday, and discovered today that I mailed it only to myself. Sorry.] In a message dated 1/12/03 4:55:35 PM, SandraDodd writes:
messages.messageBody:
[I mailed this immediately, yesterday, and discovered today that I mailed it
only to myself. Sorry.]

In a message dated 1/12/03 4:55:35 PM, SandraDodd writes:

<< What better way to discuss real biology (science of life) than to point
out that there's more biology in your house at any given moment while a plant
needs water, the cat's taking a whiz, the toilet needs to be cleaned and
there's mold growing in the fridge and people are eating?
>>

That's not all of what I headed toward saying. I mean to say...

than in any single biology book ever.

What better way to discuss real biology (science of life) than to point out
that there's more biology in your house at any given moment while a plant
needs water, the cat's taking a whiz, the toilet needs to be cleaned and
there's mold growing in the fridge and people are eating, than in any single
biology book ever?

Sandra
